name: Poisoned Palace
description:
A combat platfomer involving slaughtering endless enemies and avoiding a relentless poison pool. Not nearly as complete as I would like, but still fairly playable. It still needs a LOT of fine tuning and certainly some polish. I just scoped too big and ran out of time. Thanks for playing!

CONTROLS: 

Use a gamepad if possible!

WASD: Move left/right, crouch 

J or Space: Jump 

K: Melee Attack 

L: Launch Freeze Ring / Retract Freeze Ring 

Up + Jump = Super Jump

You can also attack diagonally downwards while grounded and airborne.

Known bugs:

  • Almost too many to mention, but the main one is that there is a problem with some of the collectibles. Should be an easy fix as soon as I get some sleep! :)

COMING SOON:

  • Collect the purple “souls” to charge your Soul Blaster, then unleash it to destroy all currently spawned enemies and reduce the poison level by 50%!
  • Awesome music and sound effects!
  • More extensive character animations
  • More cohesive level design! ;)

Thanks for playing and please check back for updates!

Love you!

  • Jordan
